name: Mama Shelter
description: A fresh hotspot in Zurich’s Oerlikon district: designer rooms, a rooftop garden, a delicious menu, and event spaces.

name: The Home Hotel
description: This urban hideaway in Sihlcity, with Dada-style design and creative flair, is ideally located as as a departure point for a variety of leisure activities.

name: Mandarin Oriental Savoy
description: This 5-star hotel on Paradeplatz blends modern design with timeless elegance.

name: Locke am Platz
description: This hotel with a difference is located in Zurich’s Enge quarter, surrounded by idyllic parks, green recreational areas, magnificent villas, and the cool blue waters of Lake Zurich.

name: Prize by Radisson Affoltern am Albis
name_de: Prize by Radisson Affoltern am Albis
description: A total of 102 comfortable rooms, a prime location, and numerous amenities are just some of the highlights on offer at this hotel.

name: Pension Kafischnaps
description: The Pension Kafischnaps is located in the heart of Zurich, between the Wipkingen and Unterstrass quarters and just a few minutes from Langstrasse.

name: Alma Hotel
description: Originally launched under the name of Lady's First, the Alma Hotel now sports a new design yet still upholds its old values.

name: FIVE Zurich
description: Situated high above Zurich, with a view over the city, the lifestyle hotel invites guests to enjoy an unforgettable stay with a unique concept.

name: MOOI Apartments Schlieren
description: For a temporary home away from home or if you want to feel at home even when you are on a city trip – the serviced apartments in Schlieren meet all your needs.

name: Hotel Jakob Rapperswil
description: This hotel in the Old Town of Rapperswil has been welcoming guests since 1830.

name: Josephine's Guesthouse for Women
description: The guesthouse for women in the heart of Zurich.

name: Meininger Hotel Zürich Greencity
description: The innovative hotel in the sustainable Greencity district of Zurich.

name: Hotel Arvenbüel
description: This family-run hotel, now managed by the third generation, welcomes its guests in Amden, on a sunny high plateau.

name: B&B Johannisburg
description: This charming Bed & Breakfast is located in the village of Altendorf, on the upper part of Lake Zurich.

name: Camping Grüene Aff
description: The campsite “Grüene Aff” is located on the shores of Switzerland’s biggest artificial lake, the Sihlsee.

name: Radisson Hotel & Suites Zurich
description: Located between the city and the countryside, experience the best of everything in the modern and fully equipped apartments and hotel rooms for temporary living.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Zurich City Center
description: Located not far from Paradeplatz and Lake Zurich, the cozy apartments treat long and short-term guests to the highest level of comfort in the heart of the city.

name: Ibis Styles Zurich
description: Situated in the close vicinity of the Main Train Station and the Swiss National Museum, this modern hotel welcomes guests from near and far.

name: Ruby Hotel Mimi
description: One of the city’s first movie theaters now houses a unique hotel that pays tribute to the movie world of yesteryear with loving details and stylish decor.

name: Intercity Hotel Zürich Airport
description: Modern design, comfortable rooms, close to the airport and the city: the ideal hotel for arriving and departing travelers, as well as for guests visiting Zurich on business or for pleasure.

name: Hotel Engel in Wädenswil
description: A pearl on the picturesque lakeshore in charming Wädenswil: the Engel is an ideal starting point for a tour of discovery around the lake.

name: Guesthouse Zollhaus
description: A sustainable guesthouse with charm and a partiality for stylish furnishings: Guesthouse Zollhaus is a lucky strike – for Zurich and visitors alike.

name: Guesthouse Kalkbreite
description: A wonderful view, an in-house movie theater, innovative architecture, and bustling streets: Kalkbreite is Zurich in condensed form. And right in the middle is the Guesthouse Kalkbreite.

name: Moxy Rapperswil
description: There is a new hotspot in picturesque Rapperswil: the lifestyle hotel has a relaxed, modern, and cool atmosphere, and is ideally suited for both business trips and short breaks.

name: Hotel Restaurant Schiff Pfäffikon
description: This cozy hotel is located in Pfäffikon, directly on Lake Zurich, and has its own boat moorings and an idyllic terrace.

name: Leonardo Hotel Zurich Airport
description: The Leonardo Hotel Zurich Airport is located in the immediate vicinity of Zurich Airport and only 15 minutes from the city center.

name: Hotel Neufeld
description: This cozy, friendly hotel is situated at Goldbrunnenplatz, in the lively and popular quarter of Wiedikon.

name: Gasthof zur Sonne
description: The family-run guesthouse is located directly opposite the beautiful harbor in Stäfa.

name: Hotel LO! im Kreuz
description: This charming hotel, with its urban restaurant and bar, is located in the heart of Jona.

name: Landgasthof Leuen
description: This cozy country guesthouse is situated at the foot of the beautiful Uetliberg and just a few minutes from the city center.

name: Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport The Circle
name_de: Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport The Circle
description: Situated within walking distance of the airport and just minutes from the city center, the Hyatt Regency Zurich Airport The Circle has everything that travelers need.

name: Hotel Drei Könige Einsiedeln
description: Top-level comfort and hospitality: the Hübscher family welcomes guests directly on Klosterplatz.

name: Tailormade Hotel Sihlpark Schindellegi
description: In the scenic recreation area between the city of Zurich, Lake Zurich, and the place of pilgrimage, Einsiedeln, guests can find peace and quiet.

name: Roggenstock Lodge
description: The perfect place to stay for outdoor enthusiasts and families in the nature region of Hoch-Ybrig.

name: Dormero Hotel Zürich Airport
description: The urban four-star superior hotel near Zurich Airport offers comfortable rooms.

name: Hotel Landhus
description: This hotel is located in the easily accessible Zürich-Seebach quarter, just a few minutes from the exhibition center, airport, and Zurich City.

name: Chalet Elvira
description: Overlooking Lake Zurich, the Chalet Elvira in Witikon invites guests to relax and unwind.

name: Saint Georges Hotel
description: The Saint Georges Hotel is located in the heart of the popular Kreis 4 district, near the leafy Hallwylplatz.

name: Pop Up Hotel Krone Zurich
description: Zurich’s first pop-up hotel lies in a central location between the Old Town and the Main Station.

name: Hotel Tivoli Schlieren
description: This business hotel is located in Schlieren, not far from the up-and-coming Zürich-West quarter.

name: Hotel Boldern
description: Nestling amidst a magnificent landscape, this cozy hotel is located in the municipality of Männedorf, which is rural yet still close to the city.

name: Montmartre
description: Personal, individual, and elegant: this is how the Café et Bistro Montmartre presents itself in the heart of Zurich’s Old Town.

name: Sorell Hotel St. Peter
description: Urban charm in the heart of Zurich − that is what the Sorell Hotel St. Peter promises.

name: Boutique Hotel Josef
description: The charming boutique hotel, Hotel Josef, is located in the heart of the up-and-coming Kreis 5 district, just a few minutes from Zurich Main Station.

name: Hotel Felix
description: The comfortable city hotel, Hotel Felix, is located in the heart of Zurich’s bustling Niederdorf quarter and just a short walk from the world-renowned Bahnhofstrasse.

name: CitizenM Talacker Hotel
description: The citizenM hotel is located in the heart of Zurich, where international business is concluded and where the old merges with the new.

name: Alex – Lakefront Lifestyle Hotel & Suites
description: The Alex Lake Zürich is located directly on Lake Zurich, only 20 minutes from the city center.

name: Hotel Allegra Lodge – welcome hotels
description: Situated in Zürich-Kloten, the Hotel Allegra Lodge is the perfect place to stay for all those attending business meetings or trade fairs in Zurich.

name: B&B Hotel Zürich East Wallisellen
description: Located between Zurich Airport and the city, the B&B Hotel Zürich East Wallisellen is the ideal place to stay for urban travelers and business nomads.

name: Signau House and Garden
description: The boutique hotel, Signau House & Garden, lies in a quiet area just a few minutes’ walk from Zurich’s Bellevue quarter.
